snippet: The report, which was published by two civil society organizations, found that just 126 of the country’s 446 federal lawmakers filed annual income tax returns in 2011.
abstract: Report by two civil society organizations finds only 126 of Pakistan's 446 federal lawmakers filed annual income tax returns in 2011, lending new focus to longstanding complaints from foreign donors and ordinary Pakistanis about tax evasion at the highest levels of society.
lead_paragraph: The report, which was published by two civil society organizations, found that just 126 of the country’s 446 federal lawmakers filed annual income tax returns in 2011.

headline.seo: Most Pakistani Lawmakers Don’t File Tax Returns, Study Finds
headline.main: Most Pakistani Leaders Don’t File Returns, Study Finds
headline.print_headline: Most Pakistani Leaders Don’t File Returns, Study Finds
